text: The Adjustment Bureau is a 2011 American romance science fiction thriller movie set in 2006. It was produced by George Nolfi, Chris Moore, Michael Hackett and Bill Carraro and was directed by George Nolfi. The movie was released on March 4, 2011. == Cast == *Matt Damon as David Norris *Emily Blunt as Elise Sallas *Anthony Mackie as Harry Mitchell *Shohreh Aghdashloo as Mrs. Norris *Michael Kelly as Charlie Traynor *John Slattery as Richardson *Anthony Ruivivar as McCrady *Terence Stamp as Thompson *Lauren Hodges as Robyn *Lawrence Leritz as Court Officer == Other websites == *The Adjustment Bureau's Official website * * Category:2011 romance movies Category:2010s mystery movies Category:2011 science fiction movies Category:2011 thriller movies Category:American mystery movies Category:American romance movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:American thriller movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by George Nolfi
title: The Adjustment Bureau
